snippet.title: Mother 3 Intro
snippet.description: This is the beginning of a masterpiece that obviously didn't make it overseas. I recommend to anyone fans of the Mother series to play this. Especially with the influence of SSBB (Super Smash Bros Brawl). I will be recording this game sometime in the future. This game is supposed to take place 100 years after the era of Earthbound (Mother 2) after Pokey's/Porky's escape to this era.
